title: Build your vocabulary
description: TrainEnglish is created especially for learners of English, with clear and simple definitions, synonyms, real voice audio and example sentences showing language in use.

title: Train words meaning
description: New effective tool for drill words meaning. The tool based on timer lets you learn your vocabulary most effectively.

title: Listen Pronunciations
description: Almost all entries contain American, Britain, and Australian pronunciations. The gold rule when you train your vocabulary: 'If you can say it, you can hear it'. It's a key to obtain the CEFR C1 level

title: Create Word List
description: Make your own word group for learning firstly. Choose words which should be leart first. For instance, construct a special word list when you reading technical books

title: Use Thesaurus
description: Learn synonyms and antonyms for fast growing your vocabulary. Almost each entry has thesaurus references. Using thesaurus effectively speed up your learning process
